tests.name: When Sunglasses2 is clicked it changes the color effect by 5 100 times
When Bow Tie is clicked it turns right by 36 degrees for 30 times
After Laptop was clicked Helicopter changes costumes repeatedly
After Laptop was clicked pressing the left arrow key changes the x coordinate of the Helicopter by -2
After Laptop was clicked pressing the right arrow key changes the x coordinate of the Helicopter by +2
After Laptop was clicked pressing the down arrow key changes the y coordinate of the Helicopter by -2
After Laptop was clicked pressing the up arrow key changes the y coordinate of the Helicopter by +2
When space is pressed the Helicopter repeats moving 4 steps and turning 4 degrees left 90 times
